name: Auto Tow Truck Simulator
description:
"Auto Tow Truck Simulator" is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the shoes of a tow truck driver in a busy city. Your mission is to respond to calls from customers and clear the streets of cars that are not parked properly or help those who have broken down.

As a tow truck driver, you will face a range of challenges, from navigating through traffic to maneuvering your truck in tight spaces. You will need to be quick and responsive to the calls you receive, ensuring that you arrive on the scene promptly and safely.

With stunning graphics and realistic sound effects, the game provides an immersive experience that will keep you engaged and entertained for hours. So, put on your tow truck driver's hat and get ready to clear the streets of the city in "Auto Tow Truck Simulator"!

Game Features :
- Multiple levels
- Car towing
- Limited time per level
